scripts.dev: concurrently -n "backend,frontend,ai" -c "blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.dev:ai: cd ai && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 5001
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
